technicalRepresentation.source:
<zofar:matrixQuestionMixed uid="mqm" xmlns:zofar="http://www.his.de/zofar/xml/questionnaire" xmlns:display="http://www.dzhw.eu/zofar/xml/display" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
    <zofar:header>
        <zofar:question block="true" uid="q1">Wann haben Sie Ihre
						Promotion begonnen und ggf. beendet?#{layout.BREAK}#{layout.BREAK}</zofar:question>
    </zofar:header>
    <zofar:responseDomain itemClasses="true" noResponseOptions="2" uid="rd">
        <zofar:header>
            <zofar:title block="true" uid="t1">Monat</zofar:title>
            <zofar:title block="true" uid="t2">Jahr</zofar:title>
        </zofar:header>
        <zofar:item uid="i1">
            <zofar:header>
                <zofar:title block="true" uid="t1">Beginn:</zofar:title>
            </zofar:header>
            <zofar:body uid="b1">
                <zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc1">
                    <zofar:header></zofar:header>
                    <zofar:responseDomain type="dropdown" uid="rd1" variable="d3promanf">
                        <zofar:answerOption label="bitte auswählen:" uid="ao0" value="0"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Januar" uid="ao1" value="1"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Februar" uid="ao2" value="2"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="März" uid="ao3" value="3"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="April" uid="ao4" value="4"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Mai" uid="ao5" value="5"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Juni" uid="ao6" value="6"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Juli" uid="ao7" value="7"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="August" uid="ao8" value="8"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="September" uid="ao9" value="9"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Oktober" uid="ao10" value="10"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="November" uid="ao11" value="11"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Dezember" uid="ao12" value="12"/>
                    </zofar:responseDomain>
                </zofar:questionSingleChoice>
                <zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc2">
                    <zofar:header></zofar:header>
                    <zofar:responseDomain type="dropdown" uid="rd2" variable="d3projanf">
                        <zofar:answerOption label="bitte auswählen:" uid="ao0" value="0"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2002" uid="ao3" value="3"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2003" uid="ao4" value="4"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2004" uid="ao5" value="5"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2005" uid="ao6" value="6"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2006" uid="ao7" value="7"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2007" uid="ao8" value="8"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2008" uid="ao9" value="9"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2009" uid="ao10" value="10"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2010" uid="ao11" value="2010"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2011" uid="ao12" value="2011"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2012" uid="ao13" value="2012"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2013" uid="ao14" value="2013"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2014" uid="ao15" value="2014"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2015" uid="ao16" value="2015"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2016" uid="ao17" value="2016"/>
                    </zofar:responseDomain>
                </zofar:questionSingleChoice>
            </zofar:body>
        </zofar:item>
        <zofar:item uid="i2" visible="d3promo.value lt 2 or d3promo.value gt 2">
            <zofar:header>
                <zofar:title block="true" uid="t2">Ende:</zofar:title>
            </zofar:header>
            <zofar:body uid="b3">
                <zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc3">
                    <zofar:header></zofar:header>
                    <zofar:responseDomain type="dropdown" uid="rd3" variable="d3promend">
                        <zofar:answerOption label="bitte auswählen:" uid="ao0" value="0"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Januar" uid="ao1" value="1"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Februar" uid="ao2" value="2"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="März" uid="ao3" value="3"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="April" uid="ao4" value="4"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Mai" uid="ao5" value="5"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Juni" uid="ao6" value="6"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Juli" uid="ao7" value="7"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="August" uid="ao8" value="8"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="September" uid="ao9" value="9"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Oktober" uid="ao10" value="10"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="November" uid="ao11" value="11"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="Dezember" uid="ao12" value="12"/>
                    </zofar:responseDomain>
                </zofar:questionSingleChoice>
                <zofar:questionSingleChoice uid="sc4">
                    <zofar:header></zofar:header>
                    <zofar:responseDomain type="dropdown" uid="rd4" variable="d3projend">
                        <zofar:answerOption label="bitte auswählen:" uid="ao0" value="0"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2002" uid="ao3" value="3"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2003" uid="ao4" value="4"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2004" uid="ao5" value="5"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2005" uid="ao6" value="6"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2006" uid="ao7" value="7"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2007" uid="ao8" value="8"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2008" uid="ao9" value="9"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2009" uid="ao10" value="10"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2010" uid="ao11" value="2010"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2011" uid="ao12" value="2011"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2012" uid="ao13" value="2012"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2013" uid="ao14" value="2013"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2014" uid="ao15" value="2014"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2015" uid="ao16" value="2015"/>
                        <zofar:answerOption label="2016" uid="ao17" value="2016"/>
                    </zofar:responseDomain>
                </zofar:questionSingleChoice>
            </zofar:body>
        </zofar:item>
    </zofar:responseDomain>
</zofar:matrixQuestionMixed>

additionalQuestionText.de: Wann haben Sie Ihre Promotion begonnen und ggf. beendet?,Monat,Jahr,Beginn:,bitte auswählen:,Januar,Februar,März,April,Mai,Juni,Juli,August,September,Oktober,November,Dezember,2002,2003,2004,2005,2006,2007,2008,2009,2010,2011,2012,2013,2014,2015,2016,Ende:

questionText.de: Wann haben Sie Ihre Promotion begonnen und ggf. beendet?
